section_id: ## 3. C∞ Regularity Assumptions on Primitive Functions

hints.label: assump-cinf-primitives
hints.title: C∞ Regularity of Primitives
hints.content:
339: :label: assump-cinf-primitives
340: 
341: 1. **Measurement**: d ∈ C∞(X) with sup_x ||∇^m d(x)|| ≤ C_d^{(m)} < ∞ for all m ≥ 0
342: 
343: 2. **Localization kernel**: K_ρ(r) = exp(-r²/(2ρ²)) is real analytic with Hermite bounds:
344:    |d^m K_ρ / dr^m| ≤ C_Herm · m! · ρ^{-m} · exp(-r²/(4ρ²))
345: 
346: 3. **Rescale function**: g_A ∈ C∞(ℝ) with sup_z |g_A^{(m)}(z)| ≤ C_{g,m} < ∞ for all m ≥ 1
347: 
348: 4. **Regularized std dev**: σ'_reg ∈ C∞(ℝ_{≥0}) with sup_{σ²} |d^m σ'_reg / d(σ²)^m| ≤ C_{σ',m} < ∞ and σ'_reg ≥ ε_σ > 0

hints.label: rmk-verification-primitives-cinf
hints.title: Verification for Standard Choices
hints.content:
354: :label: rmk-verification-primitives-cinf
355: 
356: - Gaussian kernel: Real analytic (entire function), Hermite bounds classical
357: - Sigmoid g_A(z) = A/(1 + e^{-z}): Real analytic, derivatives decay exponentially
358: - Square root regularization σ'_reg(σ²) = √(σ² + ε_σ²): Real analytic on ℝ_{≥0}
